front.title: Constrained Application Protocol (CoAP) over IEEE 802.15.4 Information Element for IETF

abstract.t: IEEE Std. 802.15.4-2015 defines Information Elements (IE), and draft- kivinen-802-15-ie defines a framework for using these IEs in IETF protocols. The present specification defines a way to transport CoAP messages in IEs. This can be used to perform CoAP exchanges with neighboring IEEE 802.15.4 nodes before there is IP connectivity, e.g., to configure that IP connectivity. draft-wang-6tisch-6top-coapie demonstrates example applications of this for 6TiSCH. Other areas of application are conceivable even in classic 6LoWPAN networks.
